security: Revealing Piccolo's assignment to JMCOBRA could expose an ongoing operation. Quoting directly 'Is returning short of tour for assignment JMCOBRA'
summary: A request for a Permanent Change of Station (PCS) overseas evaluation for Joseph S. Piccolo, an Operations Officer, to be reassigned from Managua, Nicaragua, to JMCOBRA.
summary_one_paragraph: This SECRET document is a request, dated September 27, 1968, for a Permanent Change of Station (PCS) overseas evaluation for Joseph S. Piccolo, an Operations Officer (GS-12) currently stationed in Managua, Nicaragua. The request indicates Piccolo is returning before the end of his tour to be reassigned to JMCOBRA as an Operations Officer, with an estimated departure date of October 11, 1968. The request is signed by Roy W. Forslund, and notes that Piccolo was medically approved for overseas assignment in December 1967.
title: Request for PCS Overseas Evaluation - Joseph S. Piccolo
recipient: Office of Medical Services, Office of Security, Overseas Candidate Review Panel
